displaytitle: Mosaic pavement: Menander, Glykera, Spirit of Comedy (Komodia)
creditline: Gift of the Committee for the Excavation of Antioch to Princeton University

titles.title: Mosaic pavement: Menander, Glykera, Spirit of Comedy (Komodia)

texts.textentryhtml: Excavated by the Princeton-led team at Antioch-on-the-Orontes, present-day Antakya, Turkey, 1931-1939; with the Museum since 1939
texts.remarks: Batch edit for Provenance publication project

bibliography.boilertext: T. B. L. Webster, Monuments illustrating new comedy, (London: Institute of Classical Studies, University of London School of Advanced Study, 1995).
bibliography.citation: T. B. L. Webster, Monuments illustrating new comedy, (London: Institute of Classical Studies, University of London School of Advanced Study, 1995)., No. 11, 1961, p. 171, ZM4; mask no. 4, or more likely 27, and mask no. 53
